1244-OAO_Intro-sharedassets4.assets-583-: MAYBE WE COULD TALK IT OUT?
1245-OAO_Intro-sharedassets4.assets-583-: No time for that!;We've got to fight this beast!
1249-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: the party step through the question mark door.
1250-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: they are greeted by two living statues standing infront of individual doors.
1251-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: one door leads to the next room, the other to your doom.
1252-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: the left statue explains that one statue tells the truth and the other lies
1253-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: the party can only ask one question, then they must pick a door.
1254-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: A logical riddle wagering our lives, this will be tough..
1255-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: I'M GOING TO NEED SOME TIME TO THINK.
1256-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: Why can't we just peek through both?
1257-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: the right statue explains that is cheating, punishable by death.
1259-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: I think I've got it, the answer is quite simple.
1260-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: We ask a statue if it would tell a lie!
1261-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: If the answer is yes, go through the other door.
1262-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: If the answer is no.. go... through the.. hm.
1263-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: Sans, are you sure this is solveable?
1265-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: It's just a 50/50 chance, right? Let's just guess.
1266-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: That's not a bad idea, Susie. Let's save that for later.
1267-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: AHA, I HAVE CRACKED THE CODE!
1268-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: "WHAT WOULD THE OTHER STATUE SAY IS THE SAFE DOOR?"
1269-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: THE TRUTHFUL ONE WOULD POINT TO THE DEADLY DOOR.
1270-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: THE LIAR WOULD ALSO POINT TO THE DEADLY DOOR!
1271-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: THEREFORE, WE ALWAYS ENTER THE OPPOSITE DOOR!
1272-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: Hah.. I was just.. thinking.. that.
1273-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: Sounds correct to me, let's ask it!
1274-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: Could I.. ask a Statue that question?
1275-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: GO RIGHT AHEAD MY FEATHERED FRIEND!
1276-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: Left statue of stone, I ponder thee..
1277-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: What door would the other say is safe for me?
1278-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: the left statue thinks for a moment, and then responds.
1279-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: "the other statue would say the right door is the safe door."
1281-OAO_QuestionMarkDoors-sharedassets4: SINCE KRIS CHOSE THIS ROOM, THEY SHOULD LEAD!
1285-OAO_SkullDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: The skull door?! ;Kris, are you TRYING to get us killed?!?!
1286-OAO_SkullDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: WHO WILL BE THE ONE TO OPEN THE DOOR?
1287-OAO_SkullDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: I, uhh, need to keep an eye out behind us!
1289-OAO_SkullDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: OH FINE, I'LL BE OUR VALIANT HERO.
1290-OAO_SkullDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: SANS, I OPEN THE SKULL DOOR.
1291-OAO_SkullDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: varrock opens the skull door, the floor rumbling.
1292-OAO_SkullDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: stepping through, the party comes across...
1293-OAO_SkullDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: a hallway leading deeper into the ruins.
1297-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: Susira, would you be so kind as to heal all of us with a spell?
1298-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: Just so we're all prepared beforehand, of course.
1299-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: Yeah sure, I cast a healing spell on everyone.
1300-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: the party is healed for 12 health.
1301-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: WE'RE FULLY PREPARED NOW, LET US MOVE FORWARD!
1302-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: the party enters the door with a sword icon. they are immediately met by an ogre.
1303-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: Quick, let's attack before it notices us!
1306-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: WE DON'T HAVE TO ENGAGE LIKE THIS!
1307-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: PERHAPS I COULD SWEET TALK US OUT OF A FIGHT?
1308-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: How would you achieve that? They only speak in their native tongue.
1310-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: INDEED, IT IS VERY INTRICATE AND DIFFICULT..
1311-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: BUT IT JUST SO HAPPENS I HAVE AN OGRE BUDDY!
1312-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: SO FRET NOT, FOR I HAVE MASTERED THE OGRE TONGUE!
1314-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: GREETINGS OGRE! CAN YOU UNDERSTAND ME?
1317-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: YOU, UHH, WOULDN'T WANT TO SQUISH US.. WOULD YOU?
1319-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: "i haven't squished a puny mortal in a long time."
1321-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: YOU'D HAVE TO CLEAN UP OUR SPILLED GUTS.
1322-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: "good point, maybe i won't squish you under my boot."
1326-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: "foolish adventurers are part of our diet."
1328-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: I'LL HAVE YOU KNOW ME AND MY PALS ARE ANYTHING BUT!
1329-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: WE BESTED THE GIANT GOBLIN IN THE ROOM BEFORE!
1331-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: "every night he would try to steal my golden tooth whilst i was asleep."
1332-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: "guess i owe you all a favor in return?"
1334-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: IT'S GIVING US A FAVOR FOR BEATING THAT GOBLIN!
1335-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: Here's our favor, let us past or we'll barge through anyway!
1336-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: OGRE, OUR FAVOR IS TO WALK PAST UNINTERRUPTED!
1338-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: "just this once, i'll let you adventurers past unscathed."
1339-OAO_SwordDoor-sharedassets4.assets-: YES!! ;IT SAID WE CAN GO PAST!

Woah!@ You have one of those fancy giant TV's?!
Is that..@ all you use it for? News?
You don't watch any awesome action movies on it?!
funny you say that, one time i got a rental for a movie night.
surprisingly, it kept getting really "immersed" in the story.
it would take notes on the plot, warn the heros of danger, et cetera.
i gotta admit, it was pretty hilarious seeing it get so into it.
but after a while, it got kinda... dramatic, if ya catch my drift.
so, i slap a sticky note on the tv that says:
it started laughing at all injuries as if they were intentional goofs.
of course it didn't mean to look like a sociopath, i think.
(Kris! We have got to borrow this TV at some point!)
